content: the court of appeals in caltanissetta has issued a final ruling on a case that lasted for 13 years the case involved the division of inherited property and the release of real estate held without proper title the court confirmed the original judgment issued by the court of nicosia which ordered the division of the hereditary property and determined the value of the inheritance the court also ordered the payment of fruits received from the exclusive occupation of the property one party appealed the judgment but the court rejected the appeal and crossappeal stating that the allocation of property should ensure equal shares among the heirs the court determined the compensation based on the monthly rent derived from the property and dismissed the claim for the release of property held without proper title the costs of the litigation were offset the court of appeals has made a final decision on the case and has ordered the payment of costs for the proceedings
